body: "Carnival is slowly becoming nothing but a two day drunken orgy to music where a celebration of a people used to be": Plain Talk is underwhelmed by this year's Carnival soca offerings.
original_body: "Carnival is slowly becoming nothing but a two day drunken orgy to music where a celebration of a people used to be": Plain Talk is underwhelmed by this year's Carnival soca offerings.
title: Trinidad & Tobago: Where's the Culture?
